statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); git_branch=$(cd "$current_dir" && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ''); git_status=$(cd "$current_dir" && git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); dir_name=$(basename "$current_dir"); printf '\033[94m%s\033[0m' "$dir_name"; if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then printf ' \033[90m|\033[0m \033[92m%s\033[0m' "$git_branch"; fi; if [ "$git_status" -gt 0 ]; then printf ' \033[93m*%s\033[0m' "$git_status"; fi; printf ' \033[90m|\033[0m \033[95m%s\033[0m' "$model"
